availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Thomson (Greenup County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Perlina Thomson. Father of N. Thomson, L. Thomson, Frances A. Thomson, George W. Thomson, Melvina P. Thomson, Sarah E. Thomson, Volney E. Thomson, Anthony Thomson, Mary E. Thomson, and Cynthia Thomson. Farmer in Greenup County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Greenup County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, District 1, p. 245B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, Springville, p. 828.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 24151.
"G. W. Thomson (1809-1863)," Find A Grave, Memorial 42078126, accessed November 20, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/42078126.
